title: Letter: Extension of Vande Bharat Serv
content:
[Seal of the Member of Parliament]

[MP's Official Letterhead]

[Date: 01 December 2023]

The Hon'ble Minister of Railways,
Ministry of Railways,
Rail Bhawan,
New Delhi - 110 001.

Subject: Extension of Vande Bharat Services to Belgaum.

Dear Hon'ble Minister,

I hope this letter finds you in good health and high spirits. I am writing to bring to your kind attention the matter of extending the Vande Bharat express services from Hubli to Belgaum. As you are aware, the Vande Bharat express currently operates on a daily basis between Hubli and Bengaluru, providing a convenient and comfortable travel experience to the people of the region.

However, I believe that extending this service to Belgaum would be a significant development, which would greatly benefit the people of the region, particularly those who travel to the state capital for official or personal reasons. Belgaum is an important city in the state of Karnataka, and the extension of the Vande Bharat service would provide a seamless and efficient connectivity to the state capital, Bengaluru.

The benefits of extending the Vande Bharat service to Belgaum are numerous. It would not only provide a faster and more comfortable travel experience to the people of the region but also boost economic growth by facilitating the movement of goods and services. Additionally, it would also promote tourism in the region, which would have a positive impact on the local economy.

I would like to request you to consider this proposal and take necessary steps to extend the Vande Bharat service from Hubli to Belgaum. I am confident that this would be a significant development, which would benefit the people of the region and contribute to the growth and development of the state.

I would be grateful if you could provide me with an update on the status of this proposal and the steps being taken to implement it. I am confident that your ministry will consider this proposal and take necessary steps to extend the Vande Bharat service to Belgaum.

Thank you for your time and attention to this matter. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Please accept my greetings.

Yours sincerely,

[MP's Name]
Member of Parliament
[MP's Constituency]
